title: If you stand on one of Caitlyn's traps late game...
body:
Prepare your anus.

I'm gutted she can't 1-shot anyone with her headshot, but she can headshot twice in a row and if I recall correctly both headshots benefit from the bonus damage so if you're squishy you're going to be killed from safety.

replies.body: Ayy mad head lad why dont you just not step on the trap ayy you can see it lad you gotta be a blind fish you silly baboon if u wanna git gud gotta put in the hard yards and the hard  bards make you a good support main ive been playing garen since season 1 and never lost a game as garen he is my idol and babe i mean rito really needs to start nerfing how increasingly strong ap garen is getting i mean ap garen does true damage now and his ult is a one hit if you have ludens soo why would you not play ap garen its simply the best.{{champion:86}} {{item:3285}}

I tried Caitlyn out on bots, generally games on bots have no bearing on the balance of a champion but if a full build Caitlyn can double crit a bot to death from 1300 range then imagine the QQ that those headshots will bring out of a real player.
